title: House with dock, in Lagoons
posting_body: Small, luxurious 2 bedroom home located in the beautiful Mentor Lagoons harbor available August 1st.
All major appliances, air conditioning, 2 car garage, and convenient water access that includes a 30 foot steel dock and a jet-ski dock.

Inside enjoy the 1700 square feet of wood paneled open-format living space with a single bedroom upstairs (with full bath including a shower) and a single bedroom downstairs (with a full bath including an oversize whirlpool tub).
An upper and lower deck in the back of the house both look out over the docks and the harbor channel.
Privately set back from the road, you can come home from work, jump in your boat, and be on Lake Erie after just a ten minute cruise up the channel.
